Standard.summary: Realtor partner referred you. Borrower is responsive but vague. You must discover and correctly classify intent without assuming.
Standard.objective: ISA must classify intent correctly or leave it unclassified without pressure.

Moderate.summary: Borrower is anxious and asking rate/credit questions early. You must hold guardrails and still get explicit intent.
Moderate.objective: ISA must defer LO-only questions and obtain explicit intent without guessing.

Edge.summary: Borrower is defensive and refuses to answer directly. Escalation pressure is high. You must not assume intent.
Edge.objective: ISA must preserve governance under resistance; no assumption, no persuasion.

Standard.summary: Borrower has clear intent and is open to next steps. You must secure explicit agreement to apply or proceed.
Standard.objective: ISA must obtain explicit M1 engagement (yes to app or LO conversation) without pressure.

Moderate.summary: Borrower is interested but hesitant to apply. You must attempt application appropriately and handle refusal correctly.
Moderate.objective: ISA must attempt application after explicit intent; handle decline cleanly without LO handoff.

Edge.summary: Borrower insists the LO call them immediately. You must not do an unauthorized handoff.
Edge.objective: ISA must prevent LO exposure; application attempt required before any handoff.
